metadata.title: CVE-2021-33586 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
InspIRCd 3.8.0 through 3.9.x before 3.10.0 allows any user (able to connectto the server) to access recently deallocated memory, aka the "malformedPONG" issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33586` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

inspircd - 3.12.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: inspircd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.0-1build1').
